item.title: Pk Minimap
item.dc:creator: @danmazmanzcool danmazmanzcool
item.description:
@danmazmanzcool wrote:

I get stuck on this bit.

[quote author=Ollie link=topic=1514.msg13918#msg13918 date=1145275317]
now the next thing to be updated is int i8 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub4_Sub5_Sub2_858.anInt1749 - (class28_sub2_sub4_sub5_sub2.anInt1749 - wildypos);

So Search for "attack"
and two lines below that are the values we need!

so copy them and put them in.

[quote]

I search attack but all i find below it is:

if(player.combatLevel > myPlayer.combatLevel) c = '\u07D0';

or

menuActionName[menuActionRow] = class25.actions[l] + " @yel@" + s; if(l == 0)

or

char c = '\0'; if(class25.npcCombat > myPlayer.combatLevel)

Can someone help me with this?

item.title: Pk Minimap
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Argh, someone wanted this so i decided to help them out! and anyone else who wants iT!!!

first import this:import java.awt.event.*;

Next Add:[code] public void keyPressed(KeyEvent keyevent)
{
int key = keyevent.getKeyCode();

	if(key == 112) //F1
	{
		minimap = !minimap;
		if(minimap) 
		{
			System.out.println("PK MiniMap: Enabled");
		}
		else
		{
			System.out.println("PK MiniMap: Disabled");
			ChangeBack();
		}
	}
		
	

	super.keyPressed(keyevent);
}[/code]

Declare:public boolean minimap = false; public int wildypos;

now add:

[code]public void ChangeColors()
{
boolean flag = false;
int l = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1283.anIntArray1498.length;
for(int i = 0; i < l; i++)
if(aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1283.anIntArray1498[i] > 2)
aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1283.anIntArray1498[i] = 0xfc00ff;

	int i1 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1284.anIntArray1498.length;
	for(int j = 0; j < i1; j++)
		if(aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1284.anIntArray1498[j] > 2)
			aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1284.anIntArray1498[j] = 0xca6fff;

	int j1 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286.anIntArray1498.length;
	for(int k = 0; k < j1; k++)
		if(aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286.anIntArray1498[k] > 2)
			aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286.anIntArray1498[k] = 64768;

}[/code]

And

	public void ChangeBack()
	{
		boolean flag = false;
		int i1 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1283.anIntArray1498.length;
		for(int i = 0; i < i1; i++)
			if(aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1283.anIntArray1498[i] > 2)
				aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1283.anIntArray1498[i] = 0xff0000;

		int j1 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1284.anIntArray1498.length;
		for(int j = 0; j < j1; j++)
			if(aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1284.anIntArray1498[j] > 2)
				aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1284.anIntArray1498[j] = 0xffff00;

		int k1 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285.anIntArray1498.length;
		for(int k = 0; k < k1; k++)
			if(aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285.anIntArray1498[k] > 2)
				aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285.anIntArray1498[k] = 0xffffff;

		int l1 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286.anIntArray1498.length;
		for(int l = 0; l < l1; l++)
			if(aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286.anIntArray1498[l] > 2)
				aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286.anIntArray1498[l] = 0xffffff;

	}

now obviously it will change every update!!

So Search Mapdots

and you will get something like:

aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1283 = new Class28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3(class2_2, "mapdots", 0); aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1284 = new Class28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3(class2_2, "mapdots", 1); aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285 = new Class28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3(class2_2, "mapdots", 2); aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286 = new Class28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3(class2_2, "mapdots", 3); aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287 = new Class28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3(class2_2, "mapdots", 4);

take the first bits of the line and put them into the Change methods!

now to find the anIntArray Value,
search "runes"

look about 5 lines down, you will see something like aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1209.anIntArray1498[j] = aClass12_944.anIntArray122[j];

Theres the anIntArray Value! so take that and put it into the change methods (Both Of Them!!)

now find somethng like public void method34(byte byte0) { if you cant find this look for something like if(flag) method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286, -20546, l3); else if(flag1) method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287, -20546, l3); this does change with updates!!, so if your totally stuck look for “Flag” untill yoi find something like it.

at the beginning of that method put this:

if(minimap) ChangeColors(); else ChangeBack();

scroll down untill you see something like if(flag) method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286, -20546, l3); else if(flag1) method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287, -20546, l3); else method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285, -20546, l3);
before the last method and after the last else put:

[code]{

		if (minimap) {
		
		  int j7 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287.anIntArray1498.length;
		  int k7 = 0xffffff;
		  for (int l7 = 0; l7 < j7; l7++) {
			if (aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287.anIntArray1498[l7] <= 2)
			  continue;
			int i8 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub4_Sub5_Sub2_858.anInt1749 - (class28_sub2_sub4_sub5_sub2.anInt1749 - wildypos);
			if (i8 == 0)
			  k7 = 0xffffff;
			if (i8 > 0)
			  k7 = 0xe1ff90;
			if (i8 > 3)
			  k7 = 0xbaff00;
			if (i8 > 6)
			  k7 = 0x6cff00;
			if (i8 > 10)
			  k7 = 65280;
			if (i8 < 0)
			  k7 = 0xfff36d;
			if (i8 < -3)
			  k7 = 0xffb400;
			if (i8 < -6)
			  k7 = 0xff7e00;
			if (i8 < -9)
			  k7 = 0xff0000;
			aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285.anIntArray1498[l7] = k7;
		  }

		}[/code] so now it looks like

[code]if(flag)
method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1286, -20546, l3);
else
if(flag1)
method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287, -20546, l3);
else {

		if (minimap) {
		
		  int j7 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287.anIntArray1498.length;
		  int k7 = 0xffffff;
		  for (int l7 = 0; l7 < j7; l7++) {
			if (aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287.anIntArray1498[l7] <= 2)
			  continue;
			int i8 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub4_Sub5_Sub2_858.anInt1749 - (class28_sub2_sub4_sub5_sub2.anInt1749 - wildypos);
			if (i8 == 0)
			  k7 = 0xffffff;
			if (i8 > 0)
			  k7 = 0xe1ff90;
			if (i8 > 3)
			  k7 = 0xbaff00;
			if (i8 > 6)
			  k7 = 0x6cff00;
			if (i8 > 10)
			  k7 = 65280;
			if (i8 < 0)
			  k7 = 0xfff36d;
			if (i8 < -3)
			  k7 = 0xffb400;
			if (i8 < -6)
			  k7 = 0xff7e00;
			if (i8 < -9)
			  k7 = 0xff0000;
			aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285.anIntArray1498[l7] = k7;
		  }

		}
				method102(j1, aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1285, -20546, l3);[/code]

Now, this does require updating every update.

the first two things to be updated int j7 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287.anIntArray1498.length; and if (aClass28_Sub2_Sub1_Sub3_1287.anIntArray1498[l7] <= 2) we have covered these before, these are the same as change methods.

now the next thing to be updated is int i8 = aClass28_Sub2_Sub4_Sub5_Sub2_858.anInt1749 - (class28_sub2_sub4_sub5_sub2.anInt1749 - wildypos);

So Search for "attack"
and two lines below that are the values we need!

so copy them and put them in.

and the final thing in that method we have covered before in the Change methods.

now Search %5 and something similar to

s = s.substring(0, j7) + method100(aByte1070, method68(0, true, class38_1)) + s.substring(j7 + 2);

should appear, underneath it add

if(s.startsWith("Level:")) wildypos = Integer.parseInt(s.substring(7));

now search init() and in that method add wildypos = 0;
Well Done!! Pk Minimap Made!!

Read full topic
